summary.span: 表示用於呈現固定文字的字符集。

span.span: Represents the set of glyphs that are used for rendering fixed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目代表的輸出在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The element represents the output of a in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 下列標記語法用來描述項目。The following markup syntax is used to describe the element. [!code-xaml[GlyphsOvwSample1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GlyphsOvwSample1/CS/default.xaml#1)] 每個字符都會定義度量，以指定與其他的對齊方式。Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other . 下圖定義兩個不同字符字元的各種印刷品質。The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters. ![作圖器字符測量](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "作圖器字符度量")![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements") 兩個不同字符字元的各種印刷品質Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters

summary.span: 取得或設定插入號停駐點，可對應至以表示 的 Unicode 字串表示的字碼指標。

span.span: Gets or sets the caret stops that correspond to the code points in the Unicode string representing the .

value.span: 型別的值，表示字碼指標是否有插入號停駐點。

span.span: A value of type that represents whether the code points have caret stops.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是描述陣列的十六進位數字的字串對應至每個程式碼的值會指向所代表的值在屬性。The return value is a string of hexadecimal digits that describe an array of values that correspond to every code point in the value represented by the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

member this.DeviceFontName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定已最佳化 物件的特定裝置字型。

span.span: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the object has been optimized.

value.span: 值，這個值表示裝置字型的名稱。

span.span: A value that represents the name of the device font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當具有指定的裝置字型，內建支援的裝置上呈現應該使用裝置特定的機制，來選取該字型，並將它的 Unicode 字碼指標，而不是字符索引來呈現。When a is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices. 不包含內建支援指定的裝置字型，在裝置上轉譯時應該予以忽略。When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, should be ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Indices { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Indices : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定表示 物件的字符規格集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of glyph specifications that represents the object.

value.span: 表示 物件的圖像規格集合。

span.span: A collection of glyph specifications that represents the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一系列字符形成單一叢集。A sequence of glyphs forms a single cluster. 前面的叢集中第一個字符規格是規格多少字符和多少字碼指標合併以形成叢集。The specification of the first glyph in the cluster is preceded by a specification of how many glyphs and how many code points combine to form the cluster. 屬性收集在一個字串中的下列屬性。The property collects in one string the following properties. - 字符索引Glyph indices - 字符遞增寬度Glyph advance widths - 合併字符附加向量Combining glyph attachment vectors - 從字碼指標到字符的叢集對應Cluster mapping from code points to glyphs - 字符旗標Glyph flags 每個字符規格的形式如下。Each glyph specification has the following form. `[GlyphIndex][,[Advance][,[uOffset][,[vOffset][,[Flags]]]]]` ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |
